snippet.title: Project Michael: The Halloween Nightmare - Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Project Michael: The Halloween Nightmare takes players into the eerie world of Michael, an adult man haunted by a disturbing childhood memory.

The story begins with Michael having the same nightmare over and over again. In this dream, he finds himself in a dark forest shrouded in impenetrable fog. He remembers being lost in this forest as a child and coming across a small town dominated by a mysterious little church.

Are you ready to confront the dark? Or will you become a part of it?

══════════════════════
Coming to PC (MacOS, Linux, Windows) – October 31, 2023
